/**
 * An auto generated module to execute XUnit tests.
 */
module %appName%_xunit%qualifier% {
    package engine import xunit_engine.xtclang.org inject (
        engine.executor.ResourceLookupProvider _,
        xunit.extensions.ExecutionContext _
    ) using SimpleInjector;

    package xunit import xunit.xtclang.org inject (ecstasy.reflect.Injector _) using SimpleInjector;

    package %appName% import %appName%%qualifier% inject (ecstasy.reflect.Injector _) using SimpleInjector;

    import ecstasy.mgmt.*;

    import ecstasy.reflect.ModuleTemplate;

    import engine.console.ConsoleRunner;

    Boolean run(String[] args) {
        return engine.executor.runTests(%appName%.as(Module));
    }

    /**
     * A singleton service to inject resources into XUnit tests.
     */
    static service SimpleInjector
            extends engine.executor.TestInjector {
    }
}
